item.title: Code Review Retro
item.description: Importance of Code Review I sure do hope that I don’t need to convince anyone how important is the process of code review. If you need some guidelines on how to do it well I can recommend this Yelp blog post Here I’d just like to perform a retrospective of my own code review experiences. A bit of history When I started my developer career in a rather small company - we were not doing code reviews.
